location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 6: Daniel Draper, Robert Gambier, Thomas Day, John Torlesse, Robert Sparks and Charles Bourchier, Council at Bombay Castle, to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter, received 14 June 1782, via the Morning Star,notes the receipt of a consignment of treasure on 23 February 1782 and informs Edward Galley that it will not be possible to send a consignment of woollens until ships arrive from Europe.
